Dob: OK. For verification, please tell me the date of birth of this policy holder.
re-elicitPhone: I'm sorry. Please tell me the policy holder's phone number again.
re-elicitPhone1: I didn't follow. Please tell me the policy holder's phone number
invalidPhone: I didn't find a match. Please say or enter the policy holder's phone number again.
FirstName: OK. Please tell me the first name of the driver you want to remove from your policy?
LicenceNumber: OK. For verification, tell me the license number of the driver you want to remove.
Fulfilment: Thanks. The driver will be removed from your existing auto policy, and your premium will be updated accordingly.  We will send you an email with the confirmation. Anything else?
NoMatch: I didn't find a match. You can try one more time. What else can I do for you
Failure: I'm sorry. I'm not able to remove driver from your policy at the moment. Let me connect you to a representative who can help.
Denied: Okay then. I will not proceed. What else can I do for you?
Confirmation: Got it. Removing a driver from your policy will generally result in premium change. Your new estimated monthly premium would be, $182. The change will be effective, from today, {today}. Should I go ahead and remove the driver?
FailureReason: I am not able to remove the driver from your policy because {reason}. Anything else?
